Class ThreadSleep

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class ThreadSleep
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for putting threads to sleep
    Author:
    royer

      Puts current thread to sleep for a given duration.

      Puts current thread to sleep for a given time but wakes up thread if condition is not true anymore.

    • Method Detail

      • sleep

        public static final void sleep(long pSleepDuration,
                               java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit pSleepDurationTimeUnit)
        Puts current thread to sleep for a given duration.
        Parameters:
        pSleepDuration - duration
        pSleepDurationTimeUnit - duration time unit

      • sleepWhile

        public static final void sleepWhile(long pSleepDuration,
                                    java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit pSleepDurationTimeUnit,
                                    java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Boolean> pCondition)
        Puts current thread to sleep for a given time but wakes up thread if condition is not true anymore.
        Parameters:
        pSleepDuration - sleep duration
        pSleepDurationTimeUnit - sleep duration unit
        pCondition - this callable is called repeatedly, once it returns false, the thread is woken up and execution continues past the call to this method.
